title: Chickpea purée, stir fried fennel, almonds & date molasses

ingredients.item: 2 pitted medjool or other plump dates, sliced

instructions.step: Pour the whole can of chickpeas (and water) into a saucepan with the garlic, baharat spice and a pinch of salt. Cover, then heat gently for 8-10 minutes. Meanwhile, heat the almonds in a dry frying pan until lightly toasted, then tip out onto a plate.

Return the frying pan to the heat and warm the oil. Fry the fennel over a very gentle heat for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally until softened and beginning to colour. Add the salad onions and coriander and cook for a further 2 minutes.
Blend the chickpeas and liquid and return to the pan briefly to heat through. Spread over 2 plates, top with the fennel, almonds and dates
and drizzle with date molasses, to taste.
